column1: beaten! A good delivery first up, just a wobbler on a good length, hinting to shape in and it seamed away beating the prodding edge
Warner walks at Shami, he bangs in at 136kph, Warner jumps up and defends with soft hands into the off side and they pinch a single
138kph, back of a length outside off, he's up on his toes, working to forward square
good length wide of off, Finch walks at him and leaves
back of a length, fourth stump line, he walks at him and is hurried, jumping in defence
back of a length, nipping in, it comes off the thigh guard and runs fine but KL Rahul is able to stop it
139kph, good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot to mid off
141kph, back of a length, he's back and defending close into the off side, there's no call but they go based off eye contact. Finch dives but he gets there well ahead of the fielder
144kph, full, hint of inswing, Finch drives elegantly to mid off
142kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working to mid on and again they sprint immediately on contact to pinch a single
144kph, yorker length on off, Warner digs it out easily
superb punch off the back foot through point! Just back of a length but a hint of width, Warner sits back and just punches it square with the bottom hand into the gap. Timed it perfectly
137kph, back of a length, nipping back off the seam, Finch gets an inside edge onto pad
good length, fourth stump line, he presses forward and pushes to cover
139kph, excellent length, fourth stump, Finch defends off the sticker of the bat
138kph, good length fifth stump line, Finch shuffles out but has defend. Shami on the money at the moment
Finch walks and has a wild swing and miss trying to hit a length 139kph ball over mid off. He missed it by miles
Finch walks again, 140kph, back of a length, he defends on the move to the gap at mid off for one
144kph, he drives on the up in the air but wide of mid off! Dangerous to hit it waist high but he needed to because the length wasn't there and he found the gap
144kph, fuller, spearing into off, he defends on the front foot
144kph, shorter length, swinging way down leg, Rahul has to dive a long way to knock it down but they get an extra run on top of the wide
144kph, back of a length off stump, he sits back and angles the blade to run it wide of third man and he sprints back for two. Shami didn't come close to running him out. Warner is so quick
flash and miss at a 147kph, length ball just wide of off. Not quite short enough or wide enough to cut
145kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending to cover

is Warner run out?! It's gone upstairs. He's just home with an amazing dive! He pushes to mid off taking on Agarwal, who races in and underarms and hits but Warner beat him by inches with a full length dive
good length, fourth stump, he's opening the face and running to third man
edged but safe along the ground fine of third man. Perfect length, caught on the crease defending but there is only one slip in. It was way wide of where second might have been anyway
139kph, drifting too full and straight, he picks this off, into the gap wide of mid on, he didn't nail it but the running is superb to get three
142kph, Warner lofts down the ground, it was an aggressive swipe and he sliced it a touch back over the bowler's head but they get three
138kph, short and wide, he cuts in the air but safe towards a wide third man
142kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease to point
142kph, short ball angled over leg, Finch ducks under it
144kph, but chest high, Finch swivels and controls a pull shot through square leg. Lovely shot
146kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working to mid on
145kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
146kph, good length, he pushes straight of mid on for an easy one
fuller length, he defends to mid off
141kph, short and wide, and Finch crunches a cut shot through point. Easy pickings
142kph, back of a length, wide again, Finch miscues to cover-point. Finch is furious he missed out on that one
143kph, back of a length, climbing, on off, he defends trying to get forward
142kph, shorter length, Finch swivels to pull but is hurried for pace, it comes off the sticker to midwicket
142kph, back of a length, he's back and working this to midwicket
short and wide, he cracks a cut to point, Jadeja makes a superb save to his right
142kph, back of a length, top of off, he's back and working this to midwicket
145kph, angled into leg, it comes off the inside edge onto thigh guard and rolls away to square leg
143kph, back of a length, top of off, he defends with the angle to backward point
143kph, full on the pads, he clips this easily forward of square for a couple as the sweeper comes around from behind square
141kph, back of a length, he cuts nicely but straight to point
142kph, good length, top of off, he punches this to cover
driven in the air through cover-point! 144kph length ball, he opens the chest and carves this flat through the ring! He found the gap
142kph back of a length into the hip, he gets an inside edge onto thigh guard and it drops down for a single
142kph, short on the hip, he pulls easily behind square! Lovely shot
144kph, full and across Warner, he swings and misses as it seams away. he was trying to launch over mid off
back of a length, on off, he defends off the back foot
143kph, full on leg, he clips this to midwicket but picks out the man
137kph, back of a length on leg, it hits him on the thigh pad as he tries to work behind square
137kph, full into middle, he clips this off his toes straight to midwicket
136kph, Finch walks down to a length ball, he gets an inside edge onto thigh guard and works it behind square
126kph, short on the hip, he's working this to fine leg
good length, top of off, he's defending to mid on
143kph, full on middle, he drives to mid on
141kph, full on the pads, he clips this neatly behind square, he's pushing for two but it's not on
146kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this through square leg
shorter length, cramping Warner, he works this to midwicket
140kph, fuller length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the up to cover
bumper, too short, it flies way over the batter's head
145kph, full and wide, he leans into a cracking square drive straight to deep point
leg break, 84kph dragged down the leg side and it's called wide
leg break, slower on leg, he tucks this around the corner
shorter length wide of off, he cuts to point
84kph, pushed through, he's back and punching back to the bowler
88kph, pushed through, he skips out is forced to thrust his pad at it
floated up on leg, 81kph, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
pushed through, a slider, he's back and mistiming to point
good length, angled into off, he's back and working this through forward square
139kph, bouncer, too high and called wide
142kph, full and tailing in, he clips this neatly wide of mid on for a couple
back of a length, outside off, he's back and opening the face to run to third man
138kph, full into leg, he clips this nicely through midwicket for a couple
full outside off, he drives firmly wide of mid off and takes on Kohli and beats the throw easily
145kph, shorter into the hip, he's back trying to pull but it comes off the toe of the bat to midwicket
tossed up fuller, flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
keeps it tight on off stump, and Finch guides it towards point for a quick single
bam goes Warner. Chahal wanted to keep it wide of him, but it's not wide enough, ends up being in his arc and full, free swing of the arms to the midwicket boundary
down the track, and takes the googly almost on the half-volley to drive to long-off
down the track Finch too, goes hard at the drive, gets a thickish inside edge to deep midwicket
good length on the stumps, Warner stretches forward and defends
floats up a full one first up on the stumps, flicked off his toes through midwicket
angles across him, some turn there for Jadeja, pitches on a length and spins into him, jabbed to midwicket
fuller on the stumps, driven to long-on
big appeal but he's too far down the track. Skipped down, tried to whip, was beaten by the drift

stronger appeal this time but not given. They're not going to review. This looked very close, but perhaps he was struck just outside the line of off. Good flight by Jadeja, and on a nice length, he's coming forward to defend but is beaten on the inside edge and struck on the pad flap
goes down legside so he'll have to rebowl that
tucked through square
length outside off, cuts to point

just out of reach for a diving Shikhar Dhawan. Tossed up wide of off, and Finch was tempted to slash at it. Dhawan as in the ring at point, the ball was hit over him, runs back and puts in a dive - always difficult to do running back - but the ball just eludes him
turn again, but Finch gets forward to defend this outside off
that one is too wide outside off and it's outside the tram line. Wide.
fuller this time and closer to the stumps, gently defended to cover
tossed up on the stumps, he makes a bit of room to flick this to wide long-on
flatter this time, on leg stump, tucked backward of square
fuller on the stumps, patted to long-on
zipped in outside off, and Finch is a bit late on the drive, takes the inside edge and plops back towards the bowler
tries to make room to whack him through the legside but no timing, goes to midwicket
fuller on the stumps, Warner pats it gently towards long-on

Rahul is celebrating, he thinks Finch edged his sweep behind. They're not going to review. tossed up a bit more down leg, Finch went to sweep. No audible sound, but Rahul gathered it behind and was up straightaway. Don't think anyone else thought there was any bat on that though
given some air outside off, and he defends
flatter on leg stump, tries to go down and slog sweep, but misses it. Goes down leg so it's a wide and they take a single too
googly outside off, he can't work it away
nails the slog across the line. The length was too full that time from Chahal, and Finch spotted that, took a confident stride out and whacked it across the line and over the deep midwicket fence
flatter, length ball on the stumps, some turn still, defended from the crease
twinkles down the track, very quick on his feet that time Finch, and whips this to fine leg
length around off, stays beside it and steers to point's right
tossed up wide of off, Warner strokes it nicely through extra cover
flatter outside off, jabbed back to the bowler's right
some more flight on that, still outside off, driven to cover
this time he tosses it up wider outside off and Finch flays that through cover to raise fifty. Not always fluent but he's done his part in giving Australia a great platform
flatter on leg stump, tucked to backward square leg's right
targetting the stumps and Finch offers a straight bat back
length outside off, cuts it to Saini at short third man and excellent running between the two to get that single. Saini fumbles as he's put under pressure to fire back a throw

misses the direct hit at the bowler's end. Length ball angling into him, and this was tapped to mid-on. They ran through and Jadeja was the man there, swoops in and lets loose a throw. Misses the stumps - Finch was miles out if he had hit
slower ball, strays on the pads, tucked through square
back of a length coming into him, punched to point
back of a length, keeping it tight coming into him on off, goes on the back foot and flat-bats it to midiwcket
not as short that time, so doesn't bounce as much and allows Finch to stay on the back foot and swivel-pull this to deep square leg
almost a yorker, digs it out into the legside
down the track, but Jadeja had shortened his length and the ball hits the bat high. Pops up in the air but drops near his feet
goes forward and whips this across his pads through square
length ball on the stumps, Warner goes back and keeps bat close to body while tapping it through square leg
length ball on the stumps, patted to long-on. Jadeja wanted to go across and field but ran into Warner at the non-striker's end. No damage done
length on the stumps and Warner continues to play him in the same fashion, minimal backlift and follow through while slapping it through square, on the back foot
patted back down the pitch to the bowler
slammed through midwicket. Too short and a bit slower, enough time for Warner to sit back and pull this with authority
fuller on the stumps, angling into him, flicked backward of square
yorker on the stumps, goes back and punches to mid-on
yorker outside off, uses wrists to dig this out to midwicket. A bit of a fumble as two fielders converge so they take a quick single
and Bumrah lets Warner know that he's not here just to make up numbers. Excellent bouncer, outside off, Warner sways out of the way
unlucky for the bowler. Warner was backing away a long way, Bumrah followed him and did so excellently too, but the yorker length ball flicks his pad and goes very fine for four leg-byes
short ball again, rising up to Warner's ribs, and he can't time the pull. Drops down near him off the bottom edge
fuller, tapped to long-on
keeps it on a fuller length on the stumps, Warner goes back and across and taps it back to the bowler's left

excellent running again and Warner has raised fifty. He's been almost quietly dominant. I know that's an oxymoron, bur Warner's pulled it off. Plays what has been his favourite shot off Jadeja to get there, the minimal flourish flat pull through square leg
fuller, driven to long-on
plonked to the long-on boundary. Sees the length is fuller and the ball is wider and goes on the front foot to loft this over mid-on. One bounce into the fence
slows it up a bit, on a length outside off, turned to midwicket
flatter and fullish, defended on the front foot
tossed up a bit more, comes on the front foot to nudge it to midwicket
given some air, on the pads, turned to midwicket
fuller outside off, whipped with power, but Kohli at midwicket doesn't let it go past him
flatter on the stumps, tapped to midwicket again. Kohli's had a busy time this over
tossed up on the pads, this time he turns it more square to keep it clear of Kohli and gets a single
reverse swept for four to fine leg. Fuller and some drift across the stumps, Warner saw the length and went down early to reverse sweep. Timed and placed perfectly
length ball, punched off the back foot through cover
quicker and flatter and pulls the length back, goes on the back foot to tap it towards midwicket
fuller on the pads, flicked, but can't beat midwicket
driven off the back foot to the bowler's left. Jadeja fields
skips down the track but Jadeja shortens his length and Warner can only tuck it through midwicket
length ball on the stumps to tuck him up, tapped towards square leg
fuller, angling across him, punched from outside off to extra cover. Bit of a fumble but an easy single was there to be had anyway
length on off, he's making some room, gets bat down in time to steer this to short third man
length ball, steered to short third man
fuller on the stumps, he goes back and digs out a drive to mid-off
length outside off, chopped to third man
stays back and cuts to point
length outside off, punched off the back foot to long-off
down the track, gets a leading edge trying to work it away, but it falls well short of point
boom. This time his foray down the track is successful. The length is fuller too and he absolutely smashes his loft over long-on
down the track again, not quite the right timing this time, but he hits with power towards long-on
another few steps down, opens the face to steer to point's right.
fuller, tailing into the stumps, clipped to mid-on
nips back in from a length to hit him on the pads, as he's trying to swat this across, goes off the pad to point. Half an appeal from Shami

slammed. That is just disdainful. Shami goes fuller and Warner stays still and just swats it over midwicket's head and into the boundary. Didn't even have a big flourish but timed it so well, he didn't need to
length ball tucks him up on the stumps, steered to cover. The fielder lets loose a throw and misses, no one backing up so they get a second

huge appeal for a catch by the keeper and not given. Kohli has gone for the review. Yorker length ball, shaping away a touch, his bat hit ground as the ball went past and Rahul had an easy take. And there is a spike as the ball goes past the outside edge with the bat not yet having hit the ground I think. Yes indeed it is, so the umpire will have to change his decision and India have their first wicket.
Full on the stumps, picked up off his toes to mid-on
fuller, driven with authority but can't beat Kohli at cover
fuller outside off, pushed to cover
skips down the track and takes it on the half volley to whip this from his pads to deep square leg
tossed up, Smith was looking to work it away to leg but gets a leading edge. bounces back to Chahal
flatter on off, waits on it and punches to point
fuller and wider outside off, uses his hands and wrists to whip this through cover
doesn't time it, but places it well - switch hit, or a reverse slog at any rate, I'm not sure he changed grip. Went way across and picked out the left-hander's square leg boundary
back of a length, on a sixth stump line, steered to third man
length ball angling into him, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
back of a length on a fourth stump line, nudged to third man
fuller outside off, throws hands at it - remember he has 'rediscovered' them - and times it nicely through cover
fuller, angling into him, glides it to point
short ball outside off, he's late on the pull, ends up getting it off the toe-end to mid-off while out of position, fully front on
tossed up fuller on the stumps, driven off the inside half of the bat to long-on
tossed up a bit too much, Smith comes down the track and swats the full toss into the deep midwicket fence. Easy pickings
keeps giving it air, but better length, dips on him outside off, but Smith stays still and drives calmly through point
some turn again, as Chahal pulls his length back, but it's also given Finch room outside off and he slaps this through cover. The man at deep point runs to his right to field it
tossed up wide outside off, but Smith was coming down the track and the movement allows him to reach out fluently and lash it through cover
a bit flatter, drift into him on off, defended towards mid-on
full but straying on the pads, nudged but there's a short midwicket there who fields
nicely done by Smith, length outside off, stays beside it and punches through cover
fuller and strays on the pads again, uses wrists to turn it to deep square leg
back of a length nipping into him on off, pushed to cover for a quick single
digs it in short on off, but Smith stays on the back foot and controls his pull shot to deep midwicket
super shot rides the bounce of this back of a length ball outside off and carves it over point. Superbly done.
tossed up, it just grips, Smith mistimes back to Jadeja
a slog sweep across the line forward of square to the gap
quicker ball pushed through, it comes off the inside edge onto pad

Given LBW! Smith reviews. Jadeja pushed through another quicker flatter ball, it was shorter, Smith went right back trying to work to leg and got hit high on the pad. He thought it was too high. The umpire was convinced it was hitting. No bat involved. Ball tracking says it's going over the stumps! Smith survives. That was so close to clipping the bails! Incredible.
advances down the track and flicks high and just wide of Bumrah at deep square! Wasn't far away from the fielder
darted into leg, he pushes this to midwicket and wants one but is rightly sent back
full toss pushed down the leg side and called wide
full and wide of off, Finch keeps the left leg clear and square drives to deep point
chest high short ball, Smith swivels and places this pull shot into the gap behind square! Good footwork and quick hands to get on top of it
head high bumped this time, he pulls again but miscues this along the ground forward of square
short and wide, he cuts nicely past backward point, wide of third man for two
full outside off, Finch sets himself and crunches this straight to cover
138kph, back of a length on off, he is back and pushing this to cover-point
93kph, tossed up, he drives firmly past cover, wide of long off for a couple
96kph, flatter and fuller, he nails a sweep shot and Shreyas makes a great save on the rope to keep it to one
94kph, floated up, he is beaten in flight and defends
fuller, he drives straight of long on who is wide, they run an easy two
drifting into middle, he works this to the man at midwicket
95kph, drifting into off, Finch drives back to the bowler and yells at himself in frustration having not scored a single off that ball
134kph, good length on off, Smith is squared up, gets a leading edge that flies through gully to third man
138kph, full on leg stump, he tries to whip, gets a thick edge onto pad and they pinch a single as it rolls to midwicket
full on leg stump, Smith pings this off his pads and Kohli makes a superb diving save with the right hand only. That was timed superbly
slower ball bouncer, Smith sways under it, it's called wide for height. Tough call. Looked tight
slower ball bouncer, 123kph, wider of off, he reaches up and pulls forward of square
136kph, good length angled into the hip, it comes off pad and it rolls away for a leg bye
yorker length, he is squared up again squeezing this into the off side
93kph, darted into leg, he drives to straight midwicket
short and wide, he misses a cut and falls over but keeps his back toe down as Rahul whips the bails off
lofted inside out over cover! Offered some width, he leaned but to get the elevation, didn't nail it but hit it well enough over the man
cut past backward point! He timed this one superbly. Short and fractionally wide, he created room and nailed it behind point
95kph, flatter on middle, he pushes towards long on but Jadeja cuts it off

Shikhar misses it at long on! It was sky ball, a complete mis hit high to long on trying to go into the stands, Shikhar ran in initially and then it carried over his head and landed inside the rope and rolled over for four! Horror misjudgement
full on off, he pushes a drive to long on
flicked with the bottom hand over midwicket! Full and tailing in, he just used the bottom hand to flick this flat over the man on the circle at midwicket
138kph angled down leg, he tucks this behind square and it races away to the rope! 50 off 36 balls for Smith!
138kph, good length, top of middle, he's back and across and tucking this to midwicket
136kph, he drives a full ball to long on, they push for two but it's not on. The sweeper raced in and did well
116kph, slower ball, back of a length, fourth stump, he leans back and runs this to third man
88kph, drifting in and sliding on, he gives room and cuts to backward point
short wide leg break, it sat up and said 'hit me' and Smith whacked past point for four!
he dances down and whips a full ball to deep square
he dances down and whips this wide of midwicket for two! A century for Finch on return to Australia. His 17th in ODI cricket. Again he raised his bat to the heavens.
flatter and quicker on leg, he's back and tucking this behind square
lofted inside out over wide long off! What a shot! Tossed up outside off, he moved down and stayed legside to lift it high over the rope
dropped by Chahal at short fine! Tough chance. It was angled down leg, he flicked it fine, Chahal at full stretch to his left got a hand but it didn't stick. Kohli applauded the runs saved
Mayank misfields at deep square! He glanced this off the toes behind square, Mayank ran to the ball and just ran past is! Might have got his spikes caught. This is disastrous for India
another ball down leg, and another ball glanced past short fine for four more!
121kph, short slower ball, he leaned back to try to run to third man but gets a bottom edge that bounces to Rahul
138kph, yorker down leg, he glances it fine, Finch runs well for two
An attempted ramp goes wrong! He lobs a catch to Rahul. It was a bouncer that just sat up above his head, he tried to ramp it over Rahul but he just lobbed it up off the face of the bat to Rahul
84kph, he drives to cover
slog sweep over the midwicket rope! It was in the arc, he got down on one knee and hammered it
tossed up, he drives neatly to long on
caught behind! A top-spinner outside off, Stoinis goes back and tried to punch off the back foot, gets an edge and Rahul takes an excellent catch
short wide leg break, he cracks a cut straight to backward point
lovely leg break, drift and turn, he drives watchfully through cover-point
132kph, half volley, he drives fluently, just an easy push and it races past cover! Great shot from Maxwell
140kph, back of a length, he is back and forcing this to deep cover-point
139kph, back of a length on off, he gets back and across and tucks it behind square
120kph, slower ball bouncer, he waits and pulls with control behind square
144kph full angled down leg, he glances this to deep fine leg
119kph, slower ball bouncer but it bounces very high and is called wide
139kph, full and angled into middle, he drives with the angle to midwicket but can't beat the man
drifting into leg stump, he sits back and tucks it behind square
switch hit up and over backward point! Tossed up outside off, he switched his feet early, set himself and reverse swept it up and over backward point!
switch hit reverse for six this time! Same shot, same delivery, but he flushed this flat and hard over backward point. Sublime skill
shorter length, he's back and working this neatly through midwicket into the gap for two
drifting way down leg, he sweeps and gets a little tickle fine and it runs away for two more

Tipped over the rope by Hardik Pandya at wide long off! Tossed up outside off, Maxwell launched this hard and flat to wide long off, Hardik was in off the rope, he had to back pedal a touch, he jumped up with one hand but just tipped it up and over for six
141kph, full on leg stump, he clips this neatly to deep midwicket
launched into the Ladies Stand! Full and straight but not a yorker, he cleared the front leg, sitting deep, he scooped it with the bottom hand and hit it way back over midwicket!
121kph, slower ball off cutter wide of off, he leaves this thinking it was a wide but it was well within reach
an appeal for caught behind but he played and missed and hit the ground. Full and wide of off, he tried to drive but missed trying to slice it square

Shreyas can't complete the chance diving at deep point but it gets past him for four! Shreyas was unlucky. Maxwell sliced it to deep point, it was tailing an dipping as Shreyas dived forward and he couldn't get a hand on it and it gets past for four
full and wide, he slices this up and over point again! Well away from the fielder this time
launched over square leg! Rank delivery. Short on off, it just sat up, he was back and waiting to hammer a pull flat into the crowd
131kph, full on middle, he tucks this off his toes to midwicket
short ball outside off, Maxwell nearly swings himself off his feet but he misses
reverse lap sweep! Insane skill! No third man back. It was full outside off, he set up to reverse lap and pulled it off perfectly!

caught at long on! Straight down Jadeja's throat and he doesn't let it go! Full outside off, he swatted this hard and flat but didn't get the elevation, Jadeja was in off the rope but he didn't have to move
138kph, full on off, he lofts a drive straight of long off, Smith calls two immediately and gets back to the non-striker's easily
139kph, thigh high full toss surprises Smith, he bunts this to cover and they pinch one
holed out to long off! Slower ball does the trick, 116kph, Labuschagne lofted it high but into the wind to long off, Dhawan comes around and takes it easily 10m in from the rope
139kph, full down leg, he misses out on a boundary as he can't make contact but it will be re-bowled
138kph, full outside off, there's those hands, Smith steers this beautifully behind point, opening the face late to get two
sets up for the paddle scoop, but it's the wrong length and line, he stands up and bunts it into the off side
119kph, wide slower ball, he square drives and the man at backward point makes a good save to prevent more than one
118kph, slower ball off cutter, wide of off, Smith misses out on this one trying to guide it to third man
135kph, yorker, speared at the toes, he jams the bat down, gets an inside edge to fine leg
118kph, wide slower ball, he reaches out and square drives to deep point
140kph, cracking yorker, not much Carey could do other than dig it out into the off side
slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive dragging it to long on
140kph, yorker speared into leg stump, Carey gives room but gouges it out to the bowler
138kph, another yorker, Carey pushes this slowly to long on and calls two straight away and they run well
launched over cover! Magnificent shot. A half volley wide of off, he leaned back and threw the hands through the line. Superb strike over the rope at cover
137kph, yorker, Smith faked to give room and stepped outside off late trying to paddle fine but got it off the toe of the bat to short fine
124kph, short slower ball, it stays low and Carey gets hit in the stomach trying to pull
flat batted over cover! 124kph, length ball wide of off and it just sat up, Carey gave room and slapped it over cover and deep point had no chance
139kph, low full toss, he mistimes a drive to long off and they can't two
135kph, perfect yorker, Smith has to defend and just knock it into the off side
A paddle sweep over backward square! Slower ball full and wide, he stepped outside off and just paddled, going for placement, just clearing the man and it raced away!
eases a square drive to deep point to bring the third-fastest ODI century for Australia! Just 62 balls for Smith. Superb innings. His 10th in ODI cricket
142kph, full toss, he moves leg side and cracks a drive through cover! That was beautifully struck along the ground
low full toss, he mistimes this drive to cover
141kph, full toss, he mistimes a drive to cover, Kohli misfields, lets it go through his legs, he was expecting it to bounce higher and it runs away
142kph, full outside off, he steps across and whips this through midwicket to the sweeper
123kph, back of a length wide of off, he gives room trying to smash it over cover but misses
flushed over cover! A half volley outside off, he clears the front leg and smashes this up and over cover

bowled him! A low full toss, on off stump, Smith backed away and tried to open the face to slice it behind point but he got a little nick and it crashed into off stump. He was furious he missed out there but a fabulous innings nonetheless
137kph, half volley, he carves a drive flat and hard to long off
yorker, right in the blockhole, jams Carey up and he can't do anything but defend
135kph, low full toss, he tries to scoop, misses, and they pinch a bye to Rahul
full outside off, tries to steer it away with a flat bat, gets the under-edge and stays near the batsman. They pinch a quick single
length ball, strays down leg. That'll be a wide
back of a length in the channel, Dhawan shoulders arms
targets the stumps this time, length ball, but a bit too straight and is tucked towards square leg with soft hands for another quick single
angling across him now, ends up well wide of off stump and it's another wide
oh that's gone waaaay down leg. Completely lost control of that Starc, might have been a wide to a left-hander outside off too, it was that far down leg. No chance for Carey, five wides to India
still not getting his radar right, goes back the other way, outside the right-hander's off, but it's too wide outside off
the change of angle works, and he slants a length ball into him, the batsman steers it through point off the back foot

nicely done. Too full on the pads and Dhawan flicks it with superb timing, well clear of the square leg fielder though it was in the air. Uh-oh, Starc's nightmare over has gotten worse. He's overstepped, so free hit coming up. Marginally over the line
clobbers this back over the bowler's head. No timing but the placement and intent was spot on. Free hit, so he slapped through the line at this length ball
length ball on leg stump, taps it down towards short leg and they decided against the quick single
length ball on a fifth stump line, he tries to cut it but the ball bounces over the bat
strays on the pads with this length ball and Agarwal tucks him behind square
crack she goes. Agarwal shows off his form. Full ball outside off and he crunches a cover drive that leaves fielders standing

thick outside edge goes for four. Hazlewood bowls it back of a length and moving away, Agarwal follows it with his hands, aware that there is only one slip and the angle means it'll be well clear of the man. Gets a boundary
fuller on off, jabs his bat down in time to defend towards point
well timed again, full outside off and stroked through cover. The fielder got a hand to it sliding, so that slowed it up enough for the ball to be pulled in before it hits the boundary
lovely shot. Starc bowls it on a fuller length, but it's not a length that should be driven so easily. Dhawan's in great form too though and he comes on the front foot to stroke this through cover
length ball on the pads, tucked to square leg
back of a length on the stumps, gets up on his toes to paddle it to fine leg
stands up tall and punches this nicely but Maxwell at point dives to his right and saves it. Back of a length ball going away from the batsman
another thick edge, but he went quite hard at it and it flies down to third man, well clear of the lone slip. Full ball slanting across him
back of a length, pushes him on the back foot but he taps it into the offside with soft hands and they are alive to the quick single
length ball, stump to stump, pushed to cover
good length, keeps it on the stumps, punched to mid-off
good tight bowling by Hazlewood here, keeping it on a good length and a tight line. Dhawan taps it softly towards point for a quick run
good length on off, punched to cover

stunning. That is some shot by Agarwal. Gave himself some room, cleared his front leg and played an inside out cover drive that has sailed over the boundary. He knew where Hazlewood was going to bowl and set himself up accordingly. What great execution and great eye
fuller on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on
take that. Full toss on off stump and Dhawan isn't going to look a gift horse in the mouth. Punches it sweetly through cover
gets it right this time, a full ball angling into middle stump, defended from the crease.
angling into him, ends up on a length on the pads, he tries to flick it but misses. The ball hits pad and stays near, and good running from both men again to take the single
full on off, punched to cover. The ball is making a properly cracking sound off Agarwal's bat
bouncer goes wrong, banged in short but well down legside. Another extra
full on the off stump, pushed to mid-off on the back foot
back of a length outside off, chops it down to third man
almost yorker length on the stumps, but Agarwal's moving well and he gets nicely behind it and deep in his crease to dig it out back towards the bowler

caught at point. The bowler out-thinks the batsman in that one. Agarwal stepped away again, looking to thrash this over cover, but Hazlewood banged it in short this time and followed the batsman. Agarwal ended up not in the best position and his slash went off the top edge to loop to point, who had to take a couple of steps back for a comfortable catch
length around off, defended to point
length ball in the channel, moves across to punch it to point from close to his body
fuller on the stumps, he was walking across, clips it to mid-on
back of a length, punched off the back foot between mid-on and midwicket
beaten. Back of a length on off and straightens, Kohli is left poking at it as it hisses past the outside edge
a bit too straight and Kohli clips him off his pads, but straight to midwicket

top edge dropped at fine leg. Adam Zampa has dropped his RCB captain, that could prove very costly. Good ball by Cummins, bangs it in short and it gets big on Kohli, who goes for the pull. Top edge flies straight to Zampa, into his hands and through them.
length on the stumps, defended

takes on the pull this time and successfully. Another short one rising up to his head but Kohli moves back and across and is in magnificent control of this pull shot that rockets to the square leg boundary
smacked. Down the track and he absolutely wallops this through cover. Back of a length ball but Kohli turned it into a length one with his advance and then steamed it
fullish, defended to point
length on middle and leg, tucked to fine leg
length on off stump, defended into the off side
moves across and flicks this ball outside off fine. The fine leg is square so they pick up two
was giving himself room, but Hazlewood saw it and followed him. Kohli had moved a bit early. Ends up a length ball at him which he defends towards point
fuller outside off, driven to mid-off on the front foot
angled into him, tapped softly towards midwicket for a single
imperious. That is just a fabulous shot. Goes across slightly and the length ball ends up on his thigh pad, he plays a pick-up shot that is timed so well it soars over the square leg boundary.
just outside the tramline so it's a wide, but he beat Kohli that time. Kohli was moving slightly across again, and reached out for it with his hands, it went past his outside edge
full on the stumps, clipped to mid-on
just bounces in front of Zampa at short fine leg. Not a drop. Kohli walked across and flicked, the ball stayed in the air and dropped short of Zampa
back of a length outside off, mis-times his punch back to the bowler
length on off, stays legside of it and steers it to third man
length outside off, comes on the front foot with a firm punch to mid-off
length on off, Dhawan defends it with soft hands to the silly point area for a single

caught at midwicket Superb bowling and field placement. Kohli was advancing down the track again, Hazlewood kept it back of a length, and bowled into Kohli, who could only get it off the high part of his bat as he tried to pull. The ball plops to Finch, and the Australians aren't going to drop Kohli twice.
good shot to start off, punches this length ball through point from close to offstump

snorter does him in. Iyer will not want to watch a replay of that. Hazlewood dug this in short and rising sharply towards his head. An ungainly attempt to get out of the way by Iyer, but his bat was hanging in the air like a periscope above his head. The ball balloons off it towards the leg slip area, and Carey settles under it comfortably.
length ball nipping into him, defended back
the match has turned but Starc's fortunes haven't yet. Full ball floated outside off and Dhawan leans into the cover drive that bisects the in-field
back of a length into him now, he drops it with soft hands towards gully
length ball on the stumps, punched to point
opens the face to steer this between cover and point. Length ball outside off, he came nicely on the front foot to play that shot
shot. Poor ball, short and wide outside off, and not bouncing much, he gets on top of it and cuts it brilliantly for a four
pierces the gap again between cover and point, with a nice looking backfoot punch. Not enough legs to go the boundary though
nibbling around off on a length, Dhawan tries to glide it fine. It's too fine, bounces to the keeper

another short ball nearly gets a wicket. Looks like Dhawan didn't expect it to take off like it did, he was shaping to pull but ended up popping it in the air to fine leg. Bounces well in front of the man though
length ball strays on the pads, clipped to backward square leg
back of a length on the stumps, Dhawan steers it from close to his body to third man
short ball outside off, Rahul doesn't take his eyes off it and sways out of the way, bat tucked close to body
length ball sliding down legside and that'll be a wide
fuller on off, comes forward to defend but it takes a thick inside edge to deep square leg
full angling into him from round the wicket, pushed to point
angling into him again to deny him room, punched back towards the bowler
the round the wicket angle is working much better for Starc. He's getting them on target on a length and denyin groom. Rahul can only push it away into the legside
mixes it up with a shorter one well outside off, Rahul tempted to flash at it, but misses
length ball on off, punched through cover. There is protection in the deep
fuller on off, tapped towards point. Wanted the single but Rahul sends him back, rightly
room outside off, and he's cut away with authority but a good diving effort at point stops the ball
length ball, goes back and flicks with the turn to backward square leg

he's hit a full toss straight to cover. He'll be filthy with himself. Zampa tossed that up more than he intended, and it is a very hittable full toss low on off stump. Rahul crashes it, but picks out the man at cover precisely.
full outside off, and he unfurls a fluent cover drive first ball to get off the mark
googly, beats him outside off. He was trying to drive it, but made no connection
drags it down short and Dhawan rocks back to pull this powerfully to deep square leg, but Zampa has protection in the deep
length ball on the stumps, nudged towards gully. Oh he's overstepped, so free hit now.
tries to bowl a bouncer on the free hit but it's down legside and a wide. So it's still a free hit
full outside off, smacks it back straight but it's to the bowler, who fields it
back of a length across him, steered to point
back of a length going across him again, punched to cover. He wants a single but there isn't one
stays still and punches this through cover on the back foot. Length ball on the stumps
past the outside edge. Good length in the channel, and Hardik pulls his bat in, in time
length ball nipping into him from outside off, defended
88kph, leg break on leg stump, he tucks this off the pads through midwicket
85kph, full and wide of off, he leans on a square drive to deep cover-point
90kph, full on leg, he works it with the turn to deep midwicket
88kph, tossed up, he drives to long off
94kph, pushed through, Dhawan forced to defend it nearly bounces onto the stumps and he kicks it away from the stumps! He has a giggle afterwards
skidding through flatter, he's back and taken on the pad but it pitched way outside leg
short ball, it sits up, he stands tall and smacks a pull shot through midwicket! Cracking shot
142kph, good length, top of off, he covers up in defence off the back foot
another bouncer, he swivels and controls a pull shot forward of square, Stoinis has long chase around the rope and makes a diving save. Brilliant save. They only run two
146kph, good length, fourth stump line, he is squared up in defence
146kph, fuller, he's driving straight back to the bowler
bouncer, head high, he controls the pull nicely to deep square
drifting down leg, 91kph, it takes the pad and rolls to short fine
he tees off! Lobbed up in his arc and Hardik unleashed a trademark blow high over long on! Great hands and bat speed
outside edge and no slip! Full leg break, he drives hard, gets a thick edge that would have flown knee high to slip if there was one. Instead it runs away to the rope
flatter length ball, 93kph, he stands up and drives on the up to deep cover-point
flighted leg break on middle, 92kph, he defends on the front foot
93kph, drifting across Dhawan, it's full, he defends on the front foot
124kph, back of a length wide of off, he's back and running this to wide third man. Hardik sprinted the first and then slipped over turning for two and called no. He's OK. He has a laugh about it
back of a length wide of off, he's back and forcing this to backward point
130kph, short on the hip, he pulls nicely with the front leg up, to deep square leg
132kph, good length, fifth stump line, he's back and across to defend
130kph, back of a length wide of off, he defends to the gap at cover-point
hammers a pull shot! Chest high short ball at 130kph and Dhawan feasts on it. He was back in a flash and smoking through midwicket
89kph, leg break, he stands tall and hammers this on the up to long off
82kph, tossed up, he advances and yorks himself, pushing to mid off
launched over long on! Zampa tossed it up bravely and Hardik's eyes light up. He took one step and smashed it way back into the crowd at long on
89kph, shorter length, bowling for the cut shot, he delivers with a cut for one to deep point
dropped at cover by Maxwell! Dhawan drives firmly but it carried, a low sharp chance and Maxwell got his feet in a tangle beneath him and he spilt it. A rare miss. It hit his knee
full outside off, he drives towards mid off
85kph, tossed up, on leg, he drives to wide long on and the look for two but it's not on
angled into leg, 90kph, not much turn, Dhawan tucks this forward of square
arm ball, on middle, he clips this firmly to deep midwicket
tossed up, he stands tall and drives on the up to cover
flighted slower, 86kph, Dhawan defends on the front foot
shorter length, he's back and forcing this wide of long on to the gap and they pick up a couple
127kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
132kph, good length, top of middle, he defends from the crease
130kph, back of a length on leg, it comes off the thigh guard, and runs behind square for a leg bye
Hardik shuffles across, 130kph, this is angled down leg but close to leg and not called a wide
131kph, good length, top of off, he defends off the back foot to the bowler
129kph, back of a length wide of off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
darted into leg, he's back and tucking this forward of square
full on leg, he heaves this away along the ground behind square and it runs away! He wanted to launch this into the stands over square leg but dragged it finer
he gets this one into the square leg stands! This was a similar ball on leg, he picked it up with the spin and put it 20 rows back
100kph, fired wide of off, he slaps this straight to cover-point in the ring
launched over long on! Full in the slot and he deposits it over long on! 50 for Panya off just 31 balls! He looks on
100kph low full toss, he drills a drive to long off
full on off, he pushes a drive to mid on and they pinch one
short into the hip, 132kph, he swivels and pulls this to fine leg
132kph, back of a length on off, he pulls this infront of square for one
133kph, shorter length, it climbs, Pandya shapes to pull but he checks his shot
131kph, short ball, shoulder high, he plays a checked pull shot, knocking it slowly to square leg

Cummins misses a catch at deep square! He lost it in the lights! 50 for Dhawan but that was lucky. It was short into the ribs, Dhawan pulled in the air, with no control, straight to Cummins at deep backward square, he never saw it and it landed right next to him and went for four!
a bouncer out of frustration too high and too wide
132kph, slower ball, he defends from the crease to point
143kph, high full toss, Dhawan is surprised he punches this to deep point. Surely this is a no-ball for above waist high? No call from the umpire. That was way too high
slower ball short ball, Pandya pulls off the toe of the bat and it loops juts over square leg!
short ball, holds in the surface, Dhawan tries to pull but he's hit in the sternum
140kph, full toss, tailing into leg, he clips this to midwicket and Maxwell makes a nice save
he drives to mid on
short and wide, he cracks a cut shot and Smith makes a superb save diving to his left full stretch at point
full on the pads, he clips this neatly through forward square
good length, 132kph, wide of off, he mistimes a drive on the up to mid off
nearly caught and bowled! A 130kph, cutter, it gripped, he stood up and punched it in the air back to the left of Stoinis at a catchable height but he just can't reach it with the left hand
back of a length outside off, he pushes on the up to mid off
123kph, short slower ball bouncer, he reaches up to upper cut, gets a bottom edge and it runs along the ground to Carey's left. He saves it but they pinch one
132kph, lifting delivery outside off, Pandya sways inside it
136kph, back of a length on middle, he's back and working this to midwicket
130kph, fired way down the leg side. Another poor delivery
141kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
129kph, good length, off stump, he mistimes a drive to cover
short ball, down leg, he tries to pull and gets it off the gloves to fine leg
132kph, full outside off, he tried to launch down the ground but dragged it along the deck to long on
full on the pads, he clipped this off his toes through midwicket and they run well
132kph, half volley, he drives on straight to mid off
133kph, short ball, chest high, he pulls to deep square
132kph, back of a length, fifth stump, he checks his stroke punching this to cover
132kph, good length, off stump, he drives to long on
130kph, short and wide, Pandya stands up and thumps a cut shot between mid off and cover! Wow. This track is slow but that was an incredible shot
129kph cutter on leg, he's back and across and working this to square leg
143kph, full outside off, he drives back to the bowler
he pulls over midwicket! 125kph, short slower ball, it stuck in the deck, Pandya just muscles it, didn't flush it but got enough to find the rope
full outside off, he squeezes a square drive to point
140kph, full toss on middle, he clips this off the toes with ease square of midwicket. They pick up three to bring up the century partnership
131kph, good length on off, he pushes a drive to mid on who is back on the circle
130kph, full on middle, he clips this straight to midwicket
127kph, back of a length, he pulls to midwicket and Finch makes the diving stop to his left
136kph, good length, he's back and forcing this to the gap at cover-point
pulled into the gap behind square! Short into the ribs, he got inside the line and rolled the wrists to drill it into the gap behind square dissecting the sweepers
131kph, full on middle, he checks a drive in the air but safely towards long on
129kph, short ball, he's thumped this pull shot forward of square to man in the deep
124kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot to cover-point and Warner makes a good save
130kph, perfect yorker, Dhawan jams down and it nearly bounces onto the stumps!
128kph, full on leg, he clips this with nice timing but straight to Finch at midwicket
cracking pull shot! Another short ball but this came through at a nice height and pace and Dhawan swivelled and smashed it forward of square beating Labuschagne on the rope
wide tempter, pushed across Dhawan and he isn't tempted to play
133kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he tries to pull off the front foot and mistimes to mid on
135kph, back of a length on off, he shuffles back and across and clips this to deep square leg
130kph, back of a length on middle, he turns this off the back foot to midwicket
135kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this straight to midwicket again
129kph, short and a fraction wide and he seizes on it, thrashing a cut short wide of third man! Great shot from Dhawan
135kph, back of a length on middle, he defends off the back foot
length outside off, one hand comes off the bat when he's cover driving and it goes to cover
short ball on the stumps, he goes back and controls his pull shot, keeps it down and along the ground to deep square leg
fuller outside off, clipped back to the bowler
fractionally short and Dhawan goes back to swat this to deep midwicket

full outside off, Pandya wanted line him up and hit straight down the ground, ends up hitting it straight back to the bowler who drops it. Second drop of the night for Maxwell, though this one he didn't have much time to react to
tapped through midwicket
length outside off, punched to mid-off's left
back of a length on leg stump, cramping him for room. Dhawan tries to run it down to third man but doesn't make great connection and it trickles close to him
finds the gap. Too full and on the pads, and Dhawan goes for timing and placement over power, flicks it square. The fine leg is rather fine so he finds the fence
back of a length on leg stump, nipping across him, opens him up a bit but he steers to short third man
length ball on leg stump, tries to flick it but gets a leading edge that plops into the offside
fuller and on off, gives him the room to open the bat face and steer to third man
flat on off, good bowling, tight and no room to the batsman who can only nudge it towards point
drags it down short but Pandya can't capitalise, went too hard at it. Didn't time it, rolls to deep midwicket

chipped to mid-off and Zampa has made the breakthrough. Down the track comes Dhawan but he didn't try to free his arms and swing through, ended up tamely chipping it. Starc is tall and holds the ball just above his head
googly first up, comes forward and steers it to short third man
tossed up fuller, flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
flatter and shorter, he moves across and works it to midwicket
short ball to start with, Pandya keeps his pull down, to midwicket
back of a length cuts it to point
short ball, rising up to his ribs, he goes on his toes and flat bats it down to midwicket
back of a length, keeping it on a tight line and denying him any room. Jadeja can only hop and tap it towards midwicket
length outside off, flashes at it, but can't beat point
length ball, stump to stump, jabbed towards cover. No single. Only one run in the over, fantastic from Cummins
gives it some air and it spins away from off, he wants to smash that but can't connect with the cut
fuller, and he digs it out back to the bowler
flatter outside off, some room, thrashes it through cover, but not timed well
googly, he was moving away to give himself room, ends up punching through cover from close to his body
backing away to leg and Zampa does well to keep it inside the tramline outside off. Hardik can't reach that and doesn't even try
googly, quicker on a length on off, chopped through cover
fuller, driven to mid-off
short ball, Jadeja takes him on with a pull, is a bit late on it and it goes finer than intended. Fine leg cleans up
he's beaten mid-on. Shorter length, he slaps a pull shot very straight. Mid-on had to dive to his left but couldn't stop it
moves across and unleashes a fierce pull to a back of a length one, but that didn't bounce as much as he expected, so he couldn't nail the shot properly
fuller on the stumps, taps it towards gully and wants the single, but Hardik is not interested
full on the pads, flicked through midwicket
keeps it full on the stumps, Jadeja pats it softly towards mid-off and takes off for a quick single. Makes it
tossed up on leg stump, went to sweep but was beaten in flight and struck on the pads
comes on the front foot to try and steer this one from outside off away for a single. Can't get it away
beaten again, stays in his crease that time, nice flight by Zampa, dips and turns into him, hits the pad. Half appeal
slightly wider that time, pitches on off and Jadeja manages to punch it away to point

caught at long-on. He had to go for it, with the dot balls piling up and the run-rate climbing. This wasn't tossed up, it was flatter in fact, which meant Hardik couldn't get underneath it properly. Still went for it, and lofted it almost cleanly, but not enough to carry over long-on. Goes for his highest ODI score
tossed up outside off, driven to cover
length outside off, steered to third man
back of a length outside off, Saini has a waft at it, doesn't connect
length ball on a fourth stump line, beats him on the attempted punch
bowls this on off stump after keeping the first two outside, but Saini jabs his bat down in time to keep it out
short ball down leg, and he gets some bat on it, pulling it down to fine leg
length on the stumps, flicked to deep square leg
tossed up on leg, he tries to flick it and misses
tossed up on off, cut away to cover
flatter on off, tapped to midwicket
length ball on the stumps, worked through midwicket
flatter outside off, nudged to wide long-on
length on the pads, tapped to midwicket
nudged to midwicket
fuller on off, comes on the front foot to guide this between cover and point
slider, on a length outside off, he tries to cut it and is beaten
googly, goes right back and taps it to long-on
tossed up on leg, swept, but can't time it. Short fine leg fields
flatter on the stumps, makes room and punches to cover. they take a single
length ball, swept to square leg
drags it shorter, swatted to deep midwicket
gives himself room to launch it over cover but misses it completely. Nice flight and drift and spins away from him
length ball outside off, sliced through point
length ball on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
tossed up outside off, patted back to the bowler
googly, he stays beside it and strokes it to deep point
tossed up wide of off, he goes down on one knee and lofts it over cover. Not timed well so doesn't carry to the fielders in the deep
goes right back and whips this to long-on
tossed up on leg stump, swept fine. Short fine leg fields to his left
googly, tossed up and goes through him as he tries to go over cover. Misses the stumps
length ball, stabbed into the legside
goes for the drive but is beaten all ends up
flatter on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
quicker one outside off, he slashes at it, gets a thick outside edge that short third man can't quite get his hands to
nails it over the bowler's head. Went down on one knee and slog-swept this straight back. Tossed up and in the slot, and he got hold of it nicely
has another big swing, but this time can't connect. Length ball going across him, he was clearing his leg and looking for cow corner
down the track and over the top. Tossed up and he came down and hit this very straight, over long-on
sliding across him on a length, cuts it to deep point
length ball, spinning away from off, he carves it to deep point

this time he picks out wide long-on. Down the track again, didn't get the elevation he had last time, and hits it flatter. Starc moves smartly to his left and pouches the ball, making the catch look easier than it was
googly first up, and Shami goes deep in his crease and defends it
tossed up outside off, nicely stroked through backward point
length on the stumps, goes back and across to cover his stumps and nudge it to midwicket
length on leg stump, tries to cart it away over fine leg but gets it on the pad
boom. Shami won't be kept quiet for long. Comes down the track and has a nice clean swing of his bat to send this way over deep midwicket
down the track again and he absolutely leathers this, flatter than the last one but more powerful too, bisects long-on and deep midwicket
full toss, going for another heave-ho of a hit, but it squirts off the leading edge towards cover
flatter and quicker, tried to flat bat it towards midwicket but it takes the top edge and runs very fine - no fielder to stop that one
full on off from around the wicket, driven on the up to deep point

they've gone for a review for caught behind. I think it flicked the pad. length ball goes down leg and Carey collects and belts out an appeal. Starc follows but not as confidently. Finch has gone for the review though Starc seemed to shrug as if to say 'I'm not sure'. Nothing on HotSpot and no spike on Ultra edge either. So it'll stay not out.
yorker outside off, driven confidently to mid-off. Not timed that well though
full outside off, giving himself room to slash it on the offside but can't connect
fuller outside off, thick outside edge goes to third man
beaten outside off, length ball and he is feeling for it
goes for the yorker on middle stump, doesn't quite get it, the batsman clears front leg and swipes across the line to deep midwicket
yorker on middle and leg now, he can't get bat on it. Was sliding down leg
width outside off and he crashes this full ball through cover
full on the stumps, clipped to mid-on
back of a length outside off, steps away and throws his bat at it. The sliced shot lobs up, but doesn't carry to third man
low full toss, yorker gone wrong, he heaves it to mid-on
length outside off, he's trying to thrash it through off again but gets the toe-end of the bat and it trickles to third man
fuller on the stumps, patted to mid-off
steps away to carve this length ball through point. There's a man in the deep to field
the Starc yorker on show finally. Too good for Shami, blockhole and off stump knocked back. Not been a happy day for Starc, but he at least has one trademark wicket now
yorker outside off, Bumrah keeps it out, getting right behind it and patting to cover
back of a length outside off, Bumrah was probably expecting a yorker, and he's late on that, goes past his bat
yorker goes through him, misses off stump though, and it's a big win for Australia
